channel.title: Silab Items: Editing Stats and Making Specials
channel.description:
How do i edit my stats to 999999999999999999999999999/135
and how do i make specials(I saw one topic on help recently but its gone)

item.title: Silab Items: Editing Stats and Making Specials

item.description:
@Lank_O wrote:

[quote=“Ii 1337 iI, post:3, topic:146422”]Open a your character folder and open the character file scroll down look at stats change the 1-135 part to 99999999 save and log in.[/quote] you said the same thing as A.E.M.

Read full topic
